entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is introduced as the one who shouted 'What's going on here? What's going on?'

entities.name: argus filch
entities.description: Argus Filch is introduced as the one who came shoul-dering his way through the crowd and saw Mrs Norris.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Mrs Norris is introduced as Argus Filch's cat

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced as the one who 'You've murdered my cat! You've killed her!'

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned along with Harry and Hermione

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is mentioned along with Harry and Ron

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as the one who arrived on the scene and swept past Harry, Ron, and Hermione

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is introduced as the one who stepped forward eagerly
